translations: v．重温，再次体验：重新经历或回想过去的事件或情感。
· She relives her childhood memories through her diary.
她通过日记重温童年的回忆。

sentences.sentence: In his dreams he relives the horror of the attack.
sentences.translation: 那次袭击的恐怖景象在他的梦中一再重现。

sentences.sentence: He relives the horror of the crash every night in his dreams.
sentences.translation: 每天晚上他都会梦见那次撞车的可怕情景。
瑜伽和冥想能缓解压力。
